<p> FontStyle is an X3DFontStyleNode that defines the size, family, justification, and other styles used by Text nodes. <i>Hint:</i> full internationalization (i18n) and localization (l10n) features are available for any written language. </p> <p> X3D Tooltips of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/tooltips/X3dTooltips.html#FontStyle" target="_blank">FontStyle</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/Architecture.html" target="_blank">X3D Specification</a> sections of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/text.html" target="_blank">15 Text component</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/text.html#Concepts" target="_blank">15.2 Concepts</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/text.html#TextFormatting" target="_blank">15.2.2 Text formatting</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/text.html#FontStyle" target="_blank">15.4.1 FontStyle</a> and <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/text.html#Text" target="_blank">15.4.2 Text</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dResources.html#Examples" target="_blank">X3D Examples Archives</a> of related interest: </p> <ul> <li> VRML 2 Sourcebook:&nbsp; <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/Vrml2Sourcebook/Chapter04Text" target="_blank">Chapter 4 Text</a> </li> <li> X3D for Web Authors: <a href="http://x3dgraphics.com/examples/X3dForWebAuthors/Chapter02GeometryPrimitives" target="_blank">Chapter 2 Geometry Primitives</a> </li> </ul>
